title: Episode 270: A Conversation with Award Winning Students, Pt. 3
itunes:title: Episode 270: A Conversation with Award Winning Students, Pt. 3
description:
This is the final installment of our talk with the economics students of Mount Hebron High School. The students have won the state economics championship 16 times, the national championship six times, and recently won the international championship for the first time.

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!

http://www.cooperationandcoercion.com

Show Your Support for Words & Numbers at Patreon

https://www.patreon.com/wordsandnumbers

https://www.fox5ny.com/news/chipotle-tests-chip-making-robots

Foolishness of the Week

https://www.statista.com/statistics/253743/academy-awards--number-of-viewers/

Topic of the Week
